definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: animal torn (by wild beasts); torn flesh;—abs. ´[[ט]] Ge 31:39 + 8 t.

animal torn (by wild beasts), of sheep and goats Ge 31:39 (E); ox, ass or sheep Ex 22:12 (JE; del. We:KlPr on Am 3:12, as gloss fr. Ge 31:39); indef. v:Ex 22:31 (JE; forbidden as food); commonly c. [[נְבֵלָה]] (i.e. what dies naturally) as forbidden food, Le 7:24 (P), Le 17:15, Le 22:8 (both H), Ez Eze 4:14, Eze 44:31; torn flesh, in metaph. of Nineveh's king as lion Na 2:13 (‖[[טֶ֫רֶ ף]]).
